oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mountain View Hotel
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Brochure for Mountain View Hotel in Gatlinburg, Tennessee (TN) with information about the Great Smoky Mountains National Park including photos and maps of park and surrounding area.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Great Smoky Mountains; Hotels; Maps; Publicity; Promotional materials; Photographs;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
